liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

rewardZero.label: Winning multiplier for the Zero
rewardZero.tooltip: Set the winning multiplier for the Zero.

rewardColor.label: Winning multiplier for the Colors
rewardColor.tooltip: Set the winning multiplier for the Colors.

emoteWon.label: Emoticon for winning
emoteWon.tooltip: The emoticon or text that will be used when the user wins

emoteLost.label: Emoticon for losing
emoteLost.tooltip: The emoticon or text that will be used when the user loose

onCooldown.value: $command ist noch für $cd Sekunden auf Cooldown Kollege!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user doesn't have enough points.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play

responseWon.label: User wins message
responseWon.tooltip:
Nachricht wenn jemand gewinnt.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $reward = Winning reward
 $won = Emoticon for winning
 $cost = Cost to play

responseLost.value: $user hat verkackt $lost und verliert seinen Einsatz von $reward $currency n
responseLost.label: User looses message
responseLost.tooltip:
Nachricht wenn jemand verliert.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $lost = Emoticon for losing
 $cost = Cost to play
